page.description: Specify the window height. Use CSS syntax. For example: 3in, 10cm, 200px. If you do not set the height, the window will resize automatically to accommodate the window contents. To set the window size so that it sizes automatically to accomodate the window contents, but does NOT EXCEED a certain height if the content is large, specify the window height as: max: size. For example: max: 300px
